name: agent_generated_gemini_ai_server
description: Comprehensive Gemini AI MCP Server with advanced image and video generation capabilities. Features Nano Banana and Imagen models for image generation, Veo 3.1 for video creation, image-to-video conversion, batch processing, text generation, and image analysis. Built for smithery.ai deployment with full TypeScript implementation.
description_for_agent: Complete Gemini AI integration with tools for image generation (Nano Banana, Imagen 3/4), video generation (Veo 3.1), image-to-video conversion, batch operations, text generation, and image analysis. Supports multiple aspect ratios, styles, and resolution options.

GEMINI_API_KEY.description: Google Gemini API key for accessing AI models. Get your key from https://ai.google.dev/ and set it as an environment variable. This key enables access to all Gemini AI capabilities including image generation, video creation, and text processing.
